title: Coronavirus Takes Bite Out of Apple, SoftBank’s Pizza Bust, McMahon Trying to Get WWE on Track
itunes:title: Coronavirus Takes Bite Out of Apple, SoftBank’s Pizza Bust, McMahon Trying to Get WWE on Track
description:
Bloomberg Technology Executive Editor Tom Giles explains how the coronavirus is hurting supply and demand for Apple iPhones. Bloomberg News Venture Capital Reporter Sarah McBride talks about how SoftBank’s $375 million bet on pizza went really bad really fast. Bloomberg Businessweek Media Editor Felix Gillette discusses why Vince McMahon could be the biggest obstacle in World Wrestling Entertainment’s rebound. Garrett Nelson, Senior Equity Research Analyst at CFRA, breaks down Walmart earnings. And we Drive to the Close with Henley Smith, Senior Relationship Manager at StoneCastle Cash Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
